Sentencas: A combined cooling, heating and power system (CCHP) based on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is studied in this paper.
Titulo: Study on thermodynamic performance of SOFC-CCHP system integrating ORC and double-effect ARC

Sentencas: The top cycle consists of the SOFC subsystem and the gas turbine (GT) subsystem.
Titulo: Study on thermodynamic performance of SOFC-CCHP system integrating ORC and double-effect ARC

Sentencas: The bottom cycle consists of an organic Rankine cycle (ORC) subsystem, a double-effect absorption refrigeration cycle (ARC) subsystem, and a heating subsystem.
Titulo: Study on thermodynamic performance of SOFC-CCHP system integrating ORC and double-effect ARC

Sentencas: The system can operate in series mode or parallel mode through the control of the throttle valve.
Titulo: Study on thermodynamic performance of SOFC-CCHP system integrating ORC and double-effect ARC

Sentencas: The proposed system is modeled and simulated in Aspen Plus and Fortran.
Titulo: Study on thermodynamic performance of SOFC-CCHP system integrating ORC and double-effect ARC

Sentencas: This article carries out an overall exergy analysis and compares the difference of exergy destruction rate between series mode and parallel mode, which provides a direction for the system optimization.
Titulo: Study on thermodynamic performance of SOFC-CCHP system integrating ORC and double-effect ARC

Sentencas: The effects of the following key parameters on system performance are studied separately: flow rate of fuel, fuel utilization rate and steam-tocarbon ratio.
Titulo: Study on thermodynamic performance of SOFC-CCHP system integrating ORC and double-effect ARC

Sentencas: Finally, the output area diagram of the system under constant input parameters is drawn, and the possible output range of the system is analyzed to meet the user demand.
Titulo: Study on thermodynamic performance of SOFC-CCHP system integrating ORC and double-effect ARC

Sentencas: The results show that the electrical efficiency of SOFC and comprehensive energy utilization rate of the system can achieve 48.42% and 87.16% under the design conditions.
Titulo: Study on thermodynamic performance of SOFC-CCHP system integrating ORC and double-effect ARC

Sentencas: The electrical efficiency and the exergy efficiency of the system are 63.21% and 62.67% respectively.
Titulo: Study on thermodynamic performance of SOFC-CCHP system integrating ORC and double-effect ARC

Sentencas: Whether in series mode or parallel mode, the exergy destruction rate of SOFC subsystem is the highest.
Titulo: Study on thermodynamic performance of SOFC-CCHP system integrating ORC and double-effect ARC

Sentencas: Compared with the series mode, the exergy destruction rate of the ORC subsystem decreases from 10.36% to 8.34% in the parallel mode, and the exergy destruction rate of the heating subsystem increases from 2.48% to 3.69%.
Titulo: Study on thermodynamic performance of SOFC-CCHP system integrating ORC and double-effect ARC

Sentencas: The proposed system is highly efficient and flexible, which provides a new direction for SOFCCCHP system.
Titulo: Study on thermodynamic performance of SOFC-CCHP system integrating ORC and double-effect ARC
